summary: The Down East Remembrance Act, introduced in the U.S. Senate, aims to honor the victims of a 2022 plane crash in Carteret County, North Carolina. The bill proposes to designate six creeks in the area with the names of those who perished in the crash. It specifies the geographical coordinates for each creek. The bill further clarifies that any previous references to the unnamed creeks will be updated to reflect the new designations.
